locations: Elk Grove Village, Chicago, Illinois, USA
imdb.plot outline: Hitz Boxing Is An actuality show staring Bobby Hitz, A Boxing Promoter From Chicago Illinois. Frankie Hollywood Rodriguez (Director) Follows The Hitz Boxing Staff around as they put together top notch boxing events around the country.
imdb.title: Hitz Boxing
plot: _Hitz Boxing_ (qv) Is An actuality show staring Bobby Hitz, A Boxing Promoter From Chicago Illinois. Frankie Hollywood Rodriguez (Director) Follows The _Hitz Boxing_ (qv) Staff around as they put together top notch boxing events around the country.::Francis Mahoney
